((((you)))
Charm

--- On=
 Thu, 6/26/08, Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...> wrote:

From: Kris=
tin Morris <ckmorris95@...>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Newbie Int=
ro and Questions
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Received: Thursday, June 26, 2=
008, 2:12 PM








=A0
To Angela =96 I have very poor reception and have =
gotten discouraged more than once to say the least.=A0 I have asked them fo=
r advice and I clearly received a message that stated I should meditate to =
help my connection.=A0 When I do take the time to meditate before a session=
 it does seem to be a better signal.=A0 I even asked them right after I med=
itate if it helped and they responded that yes indeed it helped.=A0 Of cour=
se I am horrible at meditating and I haven=92t taken to the process very we=
ll J=A0 I=92ll post my clips of them telling me to mediate.=A0 Look in Kris=
tin=92s File.
I hope that helps you.
Charm =96 Sorry you had such trouble w=
ith your neighbors.=A0 But I just want to say that I am saddened for your l=
oss of Monique. It is like a death no doubt about it and you will miss her =
always.=A0 Hopefully she will be able to visit you wherever you are and may=
be you will hear from her again.=A0 I know how much you enjoyed having her =
around.=A0 And your feelings are natural so don=92t feel bad about that.=A0=
 Take care and I look forward to when you are full throttle again!
k




Fr=
om: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com ] On Behalf =
Of Pridegrl Neverumind
Sent: Thursday, June 26, 2008 12:15 PM
To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups .com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Newbie Intro and Questions
=A0

=






i have read many accounts that state evp sessions work better when yo=
u are clear and focused. ( meditative) =A0I dont think it matters who you a=
sk for- its your preferences, ( in my opinion)- if you want to talk to a de=
parted loved one, it is fine to ask for them, but if they dont show up righ=
t away dont be discouraged. Also, in my own personal experience, If you ask=
 for 'just anybody'=A0 then that is exactly who youll get! ( lol)
=A0
=A0
=
=A0Also, on a more personal and less itc note-
=A0sorry to the group that i=
 havent been posting. I am at the start of a big family move and we dont ev=
en have a new place to go yet- so the stress is at all-time high levels....=

( we are finally giving up as the drug lords in the upstairs half of our h=
ouse have ruined this home for us.)
=A0
Also- I am feeling a bit of a loss =
here... even tho it is partially (if not all) selfish.
Monique ( one of my =
long-time spirit frineds) to my understanding has moved on and gone to the =
light. Although this is excellent news for Monique, I DO feel the lack of h=
er presence around me, as she had been here nearly 17 years (=A0at least th=
ats what she=A0told me)
Anyway.... It feels like i lost a dear friend.... 
=
She was quite an excellent chatter and never even needed a riado or manual =
sweep to leave clear evps for me. I hate to say it but i was sorry to see h=
er go.
=A0( i know, selfish me )
anyways- i am keeping tabs on all=A0your p=
osts, glad to see the new members,=A0and as soon as i get my family into a =
new home i will get back into the research that i love so dearly.
My apolog=
ies for not participating in the research at this time.
Charm
=A0


--- On =
Thu, 6/26/08, earthangel5998 <harris5998@Ntelos. net> wrote:

From: earthan=
gel5998 <harris5998@Ntelos. net>

estions
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Received: Thursday, June 26, 2008, 8:5=
5 AM


Also...

Is there any way to "prepare" for recording like light a ca=
ndle, 
meditate, etc? I am thinking maybe when I start sessions I can light=
 a 
candle and when I end them I can blow the candle out kind of like a 
si=
gnal.

My grandfather- in-law and my father-in-law have both passed, should=
 I 
try and ask for them by name or should I ask for anyone available? 

So=
rry for the questions, I've never done this before! 

Thanks! 
Angela 
=A0
